title: Keeping Children Safe In Education Statutory Guidance 2023 / REF LA F 2

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,/ REF LA F 2
This request relates to Keeping Children Safe In Education Statutory Guidance 2023 , sections 176-179, published on 6th June 2023 and effective from 1st September 2023.
Please provide me with all copies of correspondence between 1st January and 31st May 2023 ( including emails) from or to the LGA ( Local Government Association) the ADCS ( Association of Directors of Children’s Services) or AEHEP( Association Elective Home Education Professionals) about the possibility of including children with a EHCP or “ any child deemed vulnerable” within the scope of section 178 of the above guidance.
Yours faithfully,
John Ormerod
